page.title: 18HOUSING.
page.content: { { HOUSING A lot of houses in Peterculter are 2 story semi_detached houses although there are some bungalows situated there.Most of the houses have a garden with a small lawn.The size of the lawn depends on where the house was built. If it was built near thhe main road it would not have a very big garden.If,on the other hand,it was built far away from the main road,it would be quite big.{ { {AREA The area of Craigton Terrace & Craigton Crescent(which are on the out skirts of Petercuter) is an old folks housing estate.I say this because all the people we interviewed were over 70. CONT.
